title: Think to Win: Unleashing the Power of Strategic Thinking
description:
Think to Win: Unleashing the Power of Strategic Thinking by Paul Butler, John F. Manfredi, Peter Klein

Overview: The proven plan for making strategic thinking part of any organizationâ€™s DNA to drive sustainable growth

In todayâ€™s ultra-competitive business world, the difference between success and failure lies in the ability to get every employee to think and behave like a strategist.

Think to Win helps business leaders expand strategic thinking out of the purview of â€œthe elite fewâ€ and into the company culture as whole. It offers a simple, proven approach to analyzing and solving old or new challenges and provides a common language anyone at any level in the organization can understand
